algorithm_technique: Tree Traversal with Binary Search-like logic.
Iterative descent through the rope tree based on lengths.
problem_summary_simple: Find the k-th character in a string formed by concatenating parts of a special binary tree.
problem_summary_technical: Traverse the rope tree, using node lengths to determine which child subtree contains the k-th character.
time_complexity: O(h), where h is the height of the tree
key_insights: The rope tree structure allows efficient navigation without full string construction.
The `node.len` property is key to deciding which branch to follow.
The logic is similar to finding an element in a balanced binary search tree or a segment tree.
